silent epsilon Schlamassel (little sigma SH/GH/ƒH)

𐌼𐌴𐌻 Mal,Mahl < Meißel Messe ( time,hour,writing,scripture )
𐌼𐌴𐌻𐌰 Mal (sic) < measure!
𐌼𐌰𐍂𐌴𐌹𐌽 Marine < Marschen

𐌱𐌴𐍂𐌿𐌽 bearen < Bescheren

𐌱𐌴𐌳𐌿𐌽 Bitten επαιτώ < •Bistan? اِسْتَجْدَى bistajdā болишти ხვეწნა ביקש bikésh begs ?
𐌱𐌴𐌳𐌿𐌽 Bitten < 𐎁𐎖𐎘 bqṯ bequitzen bequatschen 𐌵𐌹𐌸𐌰𐌽/𐌵𐌹𐍃𐍃 ☑

𐌷𐌴𐍂 Hier < Hither
𐍃𐌰𐌴𐌹 Sei < Seiso™ (Sei es so dass …)

𐌿𐌽𐍄𐌴 until < whence (!) [ << donde ]
𐌿𐌽𐍄𐌴 Wenn/dass … Denn/dass …

-𐌽𐌴𐌹 ⋍ -nei < -ness suffix
-𐌴𐌹 ⋍ -ei < -sein -heit suffix

𐍄𐌰𐌹𐌺𐌽 Zeichen
𐍄𐌰𐌹𐌺𐌽𐌴 Zeugnis

𐌹𐍉𐌷𐌰𐌽𐌽𐌴𐌽 Johannes ⋍ Johansson

Some words are just vague, yet noticably aligning matches of modern variants:
𐌸𐌰𐌲𐌲𐌺𐌴𐌹𐌸
Discuss
Denkest

𐍈𐌹𐌻𐌴𐌹𐌺𐍃
Welches ?

In some cases the s in 𐌴 just confirms the previous character
𐌰𐌽𐌳𐌰𐍃𐌴𐍄𐍃 entsetz(lich) ant.Ssets

In some cases a dangling 's' makes little sense to the modern ear:
𐌰𐌽𐌳𐌰𐌽𐌴𐌼𐍃
𐌰𐍆𐌷𐌰𐌹𐌼𐌴𐌹𐍃 abheimisch < abheimsisch
𐍆𐍂𐌴𐌹𐍃 Frei < Frisis?
𐍄𐌴𐌹𐌼𐌰𐌿𐌸𐌰𐌹𐌿𐍃 Timothy < Tsimautains?
𐌲𐌰𐌱𐍂𐌹𐌴𐌻 GabriEl < Gabrisel ?

In some cases a dangling 's' makes zero sense to the author
𐌽𐌴𐌹𐌸 Neid > hate Unscheid?? nishad ⇔ shina שנאה ⇔ 憎しみ nikushimi ϣⲟⲩⲙⲟⲥ
𐌽𐌴𐌹𐌸 Neid < Nashid? ⋍ Mnassde 𓄟 𓋴 𓆓 𓀁 ⲙⲁⲥⲧⲉ
𐌽𐌴𐌹𐌸 Neid < nenávist
𐌽𐌴𐌹𐌸 Neid < neƒid ⇔ nefret 𓄤 نفرت? neapykanta !? > envy
𐌽𐌴𐌹𐌸 Neid < 𓄟 𓋴 𓆓 𓀁 •mnesshed mischief 𐌽𐌴𐌹𐌸
𐌽𐌴𐌹𐌸 Neid < 𓄟 𓋴 𓆓 𓀁 •mnesshed > misschande μῖσος שנאה 𓊃 𓆑 𓄿 𓅪 shun 𓍲 𓈖 𓏮 𓀁 恨

𐌰𐌽𐌳𐌰𐌽𐌴𐌼𐍃 An(t)nehm(bar) ⇔ 𐌽𐌹𐌼𐌰𐌽 nehmen ⇔ დათანხმება anxmeba
𐌽𐌴𐌼 nehme < nechomai ⋍ δέχομαι déchomai ?? 𓎁
𐌽𐌴𐌼 nehmen < neghmen ? 𓌆 𓈖 𓎡 ⇔ snatch ?

It is called epsilon for a reason: In some cases it 'eps' was just a silent 'e'
